name: Boqola
description:
Welcome to Boqola!
Your village has been poisoned and you must find a cure! Use different hats to collect enough of the bashful mushrooms and solve the puzzles to collect all the fallen stars!

Press I for controls in game
Known issues:
at the start of the game for about 20 seconds it will have a low FPS and then will stabilize at around 60-90 FPS. this is being patched soon!
